behavior_star_tasks_to_top.instructions: When starring an item, move it to the top of the list
behavior_star_tasks_to_top.instructionsReverse: Do not automatically move starred items to the top of the list
behavior_star_tasks_to_top.label: Star moves item to top

confirm_delete_entity.instructions: When deleting an item, ask me for confirmation
confirm_delete_entity.instructionsReverse: When deleting an item, don't ask me for confirmation
confirm_delete_entity.label: Confirm before deleting items

new_task_location.instructions: When creating a new todo, add it at the top of the current list
new_task_location.instructionsReverse: When creating a new todo, add it at the bottom of the current list
new_task_location.label: Add Items

tab.description:
Notify me of important events via:
Stay in sync and get notified when items are added or completed in your shared lists. You can choose which lists you get notifications about, in each list's edit dialog.
tab.name: Notifications

-JptMm7ynO_Rr-3Be5ex.instructions: After completing each step of this tutorial, click the blue "Next" button in the instructions bar (at the top of the screen). Try it now!

-JptMm_ACl9ddC7q2fiq.instructions: Type "buy milk" in the input field, and press Enter to add a new todo item.

-JptMn6gtAUGLhMHV5BT.instructions: Double-click on the todo item you added to show the details panel on the right.

-JptMn_fgwlCtrT9yrJ5.instructions: Write a more detailed description in the yellow area on the right: "for the cake"
